sections.heading: Department created.
sections.text:
1-47-1.1. Department created.

There is hereby created a Department of Revenue.

Source:SL 2011, ch 1 (Ex. Ord. 11-1), §35, eff. Apr. 12, 2011.

sections.heading: Secretary as head of department.
sections.text:
1-47-2. Secretary as head of department.

The head of the Department of Revenue is the secretary of revenue who shall be appointed by the Governor, by and with the consent of the senate, and serve at the pleasure of the Governor.

Source:SL 1973, ch 2, §278; SL 2003, ch 272 (Ex. Ord. 03-1) §82; SL 2011, ch 1 (Ex. Ord. 11-1), §110, eff. Apr. 12, 2011.

sections.heading: Performance of departmental functions.
sections.text:
1-47-3. Performance of departmental functions.

The Department of Revenue shall, under the direction and control of the secretary of revenue, perform all the functions of the Department of Revenue created by chapter 10-1.

Source:SL 1973, ch 2, §§54, 280; SL 2003, ch 272 (Ex. Ord. 03-1) §82; SL 2011, ch 1 (Ex. Ord. 11-1), §111, eff. Apr. 12, 2011.

sections.heading: Banking Commission continued.
sections.text:
1-47-7. Banking Commission continued.

The South Dakota State Banking Commission shall continue in the Department of Labor and Regulation. The secretary of the Department of Labor and Regulation shall perform the functions of the former secretary of the Department of Revenue and Regulation, relating to the South Dakota State Banking Commission.

Source:SL 2003, ch 272 (Ex. Ord. 03-1), §25, eff. Apr. 17, 2003; SL 2011, ch 1 (Ex. Ord. 11-1), §114, eff. Apr. 12, 2011.
